Job_Title: IT Manager (Data Science) Information Technology Jobs Singapore | MyCareersFuture Singapore
Job_Desc_Req:
Collaborate with data scientists to understand their data, processing, and infrastructure needs to support AI and machine learning initiatives effectively.
Ensure IT infrastructure is capable of supporting AI applications by providing high-performance computing resources and cloud-based platforms.
Facilitate data accessibility across various sources, such as CRM, ERP, and e-commerce systems, while ensuring security and compliance.
Work with data scientists to operationalize machine learning models by setting up deployment, monitoring, and continuous improvement frameworks.
Evaluate and implement AI/ML platforms, tools, and technologies to enhance data science workflows, including model training and deployment.
Oversee data security protocols to protect sensitive information and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.
Support data visualization initiatives and provide technical guidance to data science and BI teams for large-scale data analysis.
Manage IT systems for optimal performance, ensuring scalability as data volumes grow and applications become more data-intensive.
Min Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field; master’s degree is a plus.
Min 5-7 years of experience in IT management, with a strong understanding of data science methodologies, machine learning, and AI tools.
Proficiency in data science platforms and tools (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Jupyter notebooks) and cloud services supporting AI (e.g., AWS SageMaker, Google AI Platform).
Strong knowledge of data governance, data privacy regulations and compliance best practices.
Experience in overseeing model deployment processes, including MLOps and AI lifecycle management.
Familiarity with BI and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and the ability to support data storytelling initiatives.

Job_Title: Service Delivery Manager, AWS Data Analytics - AI&A Consulting Jobs Singapore | MyCareersFuture Singapore
Job_Desc_Req:
Oversee the end-to-end delivery of IT and data analytics services to public sector clients, ensuring that services are delivered on time, within scope, and meet agreed-upon quality standards.
Monitor and manage SLAs, ensuring that all services are delivered in accordance with contractual obligations.
Proactively identify and resolve service delivery issues, escalating as necessary to ensure minimal disruption to public sector operations.
Act as the primary point of contact for public sector clients, building and maintaining strong relationships with key stakeholders.
Conduct regular service review meetings with clients to discuss performance, address concerns, and identify opportunities for service improvement.
Ensure that client feedback is captured and acted upon to continuously improve service delivery.
Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, and other technical teams to ensure the successful deployment and operation of data analytics platforms.
Provide expertise in data integration, data warehousing, and big data processing to support public sector decision-making and operational efficiency.
Identify and implement continuous improvement initiatives to enhance service delivery processes and outcomes.
Work closely with internal teams to develop and implement best practices for service delivery in the public sector.
Monitor industry trends and emerging technologies to ensure that services remain relevant and aligned with public sector needs.
Identify and mitigate risks related to service delivery, ensuring that potential issues are addressed before they impact service quality.
Develop and maintain contingency plans to ensure business continuity in the event of service disruptions.
Prepare and present regular service performance reports to both internal and external stakeholders.
Maintain comprehensive documentation of service delivery processes, SLAs, and client communications.
Ensure that all service delivery activities are fully documented and comply with relevant regulatory requirements.
Lead and mentor a team of service delivery professionals, providing guidance and support to ensure high performance and professional development.
Foster a collaborative and inclusive team environment, promoting a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Data Science, Business Administration, Public Administration, or a related field.
Relevant certifications such as ITIL, PMP, AWS Certified Data Analytics – Specialty, or PRINCE2 are highly desirable.
Experience in service delivery management, preferably within the public sector or a related industry
Proven track record of managing complex IT service delivery projects and ensuring compliance with SLAs.
Experience working with public sector clients in Singapore is highly advantageous.
Strong understanding of IT service management frameworks (e.g., ITIL) and best practices.
Excellent client relationship management and communication skills.
Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
Ability to manage multiple priorities and work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
Knowledge of public sector operations, policies, and regulatory requirements in Singapore.
Proficiency in project management tools and software
